title: Sajid Javid – 2022 Comments on Improving Drug Treatment in Deprived Areas
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sajid Javid, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 13 April 2022.
content:
This is a significant step in our commitment to rebuild the drug treatment system, save lives and level up the country.
